title: Multi-channel Notification System
description: As a user, I want to receive notifications about important events so that I stay informed about my orders, account activity, and promotions.
acceptance_criteria: System sends notifications via: email, SMS, push notifications (mobile app)
User can customize notification preferences by type and channel
Notifications include: order confirmation, shipping updates, delivery, promotions
Notification templates are professional and branded
Notifications are sent in real-time or near real-time
User can opt-out of non-critical notifications
System respects quiet hours (no notifications 10 PM - 8 AM)
Notification delivery status is tracked and logged
Failed notification deliveries trigger retry mechanism

comments.author: Developer
comments.text: Using Twilio for SMS and SendGrid for email. Push notifications via Firebase.

comments.author: QA Engineer
comments.text: Testing notification delivery across all channels. Minor timing issues with SMS gateway.
